name: Dice Bot
description: DICE Bot is a decentralized gaming platform built on the Ethereum blockchain, accessible via Telegram. The primary function is to offer a secure and transparent environment for playing dice games. Users can place bets using various tokens like USDC, WETH, and the platform's native token, $DICE. The utility of the $DICE token extends to governance and revenue-sharing, allowing the community to have a say in future developments. The bot employs smart contracts to ensure that all games are fair, and the outcomes are verifiable on the blockchain. The platform aims to provide a seamless and trustworthy gaming experience, democratizing access to betting games while ensuring full transparency and security.
